amendment.description: To establish a task force for regulatory oversight and review.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1929, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 211.

action.text: Amendment SA 1929 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3493-3494; text: CR S3343) To establish a task force for regulatory oversight and review.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1929, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 211.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1929, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 211.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1929 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 1502.
